Description:
Using close method in RunTask class but FileNotFoundException is thrown and the file path is incorrect.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using RunTask to generate a report document
2. Close the task

Result:
The path to generate report document is repeated and the repeated result is saved to the final path.
java.io.FileNotFoundException: D:\TEMP\workspace3.1\org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine\output\report_document\D:\TEMP\workspace3.1\org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine\output\report_document (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect)
